page.title: 11Home life
page.content: Most houses cook by electricity, there are a few solid fuel stoves; heating is by either coal, wood or oil fired central heating. There is no town gas. All households have a garden and most grow both flowers and vegetables. Hobbies are varied. Music, painting, reading, DIY, bee-keeping, dancing, riding, gardening, sewing, knitting, photography, cricket.Other family activities include going out to pubs, friends, theatre, concerts, walking, restaurants, meetings of local organisations. Most people belong to some club or association including voluntary bodies, music societies, history societies, young farmers, darts, W.I. (all outside area). Those with children send them to Whittingham Primary school (4 miles) or Alnwick Senior school (5 miles). Transport is provided.
